mapper.select: SELECT r.rentalId, r.rentalDt, r.returnDt, r.rentalStat, u.userId, u.userNm, c.contentId, c.contentNm FROM Rental r LEFT JOIN User u ON r.rentalUserId = u.userId LEFT JOIN Content c ON r.contentId = c.contentId WHERE rentalStat = #{rentalStat}

SELECT rt.rentalId, b.boardNm, b.boardId, cc.cateNm, rt.contentId, c.contentNm, rt.rentalDt, rt.predReturnDt, rt.returnDt, rt.rentalStat FROM (SELECT r.rentalId, r.contentId, r.rentalDt, r.returnDt, r.predReturnDt, r.rentalStat FROM Rental r WHERE r.rentalUserId = #{userId}) rt LEFT JOIN Content c ON c.contentId = rt.contentId LEFT JOIN Board b ON b.boardId = c.boardId LEFT JOIN ContentCategory cc ON cc.cateId = c.cateId LEFT JOIN Rental r ON r.contentId = c.contentId ;
mapper.update: UPDATE Rental SET rentalStat = 'CD001003' WHERE predReturnDt < NOW() AND rentalStat = 'CD001001'
mapper.select: SELECT rentalStat FROM Rental WHERE contentId = ${contentId} ORDER BY modfDt DESC LIMIT 1
